text:
**Page 1**
"""
DBS: Broly – 20 Reddit Reviews (r/dbz)
1. StarPlatinum55
Very good. It's the best DB film imo.
2. LeratoNull
Still inferior to Battle of Gods, still very good tho.
3. u4004
Both movies have mediocre stories, both have entertaining characters. DBS: Broly has
Minus, but it's so disconnected from everything and out of nowhere that you can ignore it
like the low-quality Toriyama fever dream it is. The animation quality alone decides the
day, BoG's best art style is nasty compared to DBS: Broly's worst.
4. Kunxion
Extremely good. One of the best Dragonball movies imo.
5. blade55555
I enjoyed it. Fun watch and the fight scenes are fantastic. Without spoilers, I watched
Vegeta's and the last fight scene way too many times.
6. KeySlimePies
I think it's easily the best movie. I ranked most of the movies in order of their quality.
For example of how I rated them the way I did: while The Tree of Might is really well-
received on this subreddit, I think it's actually only so-so because the first half of the
movie is completely unrelated to the plot (putting out the forest fire) and the final
fight with Turles is actually not that good. This is my list in order of quality:  Good:
Broly (2018), Battle of Gods, Wrath of the Dragon, Dead Zone, The World's Strongest, Broly
-- The Legendary Super Saiyan, Fusion Reborn, Resurrection 'F'  So-so: The Return of
Cooler, Cooler's Revenge, The Tree of Might, Bojack Unbound, Broly -- Second Coming, Super
Android 13!  Bad: Bio-Broly, Lord Slug
7. ToodlesXIV
It's the best DB Movie by a mile, and honestly just peak Dragon Ball in general. The
script has Toriyama written all over it, and the animation is mind blowing.
8. shlam16
Lore: 9/10  Story: 7/10  Animation: 10/10  Fights: 10/10  Music: 6/10 (others like the
style, I didn't go for it)  Pacing: 3/10 (the main reason it needs to be adapted in the
anime)  TL;DR - It's good, watch it. Then start reading the manga at Chapter 42 for the
best arc in Super to date.
9. [deleted]
Pacing: 3/10  I agree with that. The movie felt like it could have been at least 2x longer
(especially the first third) and they had to cut Toriyama's script down a lot apparently.
The director stated that Gogeta and Broly were originally going to fight on the Sun at one
point.  If they expanded the Saiyan/Bardock segment (with Bardock's last stand) and
dedicate an episode to Gogeta vs Broly, then it would be amazing.
"""

**Page 2**
"""
10. EP1K
If they do adapt it I hope they don't drag it on as long as BoG. I honestly can't rewatch
those episodes of Super they're so drawn out. I'd love to see how Freeza held up so long
against Broly. Maybe more Broly/Paragus backstory and more Planet Vegeta drama. The movie
did so many things right but the pacing was definitely a weak point.
11. DetlefHemp
I really enjoyed it. I actually showed it to my girlfriend to try and get her to get over
the whole "anime is gay" trap that a lot of people fall victim to... It was a success.
12. SSJRemuko
Its easily (imo) one of, if not the best DB related movie, ever.
13. BlueFootedTpeack
top tier,  nice animation, very fast and expressive, plenty of detailed looks, cool music,
front loads the plot pretty heavily,  best db film
14. kakkarot_73
It’s great. Oh and prepare yourself for the chants.
15. lightedge
Overall really good lore, really good animation too. There is some bad character CGI
though, such as the combined Goku and Vegeta beam attack that looks noticeably worse then
the real 2d art.
16. Megadoomer2
I'd say that it's one of my favourite DBZ movies - it's either DBS Broly or Battle of
Gods.
17. ArtisanofWar7
The pacing is the only true issue, the music chants are personal preference  Otherwise,
it's probably the best if not one of the best dragonball movies there is
18. ItsLucs
It's a good film, good animation, good music... But it's empty, 30 min of story, 1h15 of
fighting, and some scenes would have been more developped i think :) but it's still one of
my favorite :)
19. Finally_Vanilla
You know where Brolys dad said "Attaaaaack!" to broly? They did the same scene in this new
one and i laughed and exited. I couldnt take it anymore.
20. mhead26
Looked a little disney in the graphics sometimes but other than that it was great.
"""
